titleInfo.title: Letter from Major General William Grant Keir, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Grant Keir writes that he expects operations on the Arab coast to be complete in the next day or so, in that all fortifications considered important will have been destroyed, guns confiscated, and all boats larger than those used for pearling and fishing also confiscated. Grant Keir states that he hopes to then proceed to Kenn [KÄ«sh] island to 'water'. He also discusses action against piracy on the Persian coast, stressing that he considers Bruce's presence on this expedition to be particularly necessary.
